oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Opening statement by chairman of the committee of the whole to organizational meeting of Interracial Advisory Committee, 1955 November 15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Initial remarks to open the first Board of Education Interracial Advisory Committee meeting, listing the committee's goals and objectives to provide an educational environment free of discrimination in Chattanooga, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Law and legislation; Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
